title: We have restored an older version of LOL
body:
It says this when I open it, (I am "testing" the new client) and it says it needs to update.  Of which, it says it has to update 0mb, and it is constantly says 0 eta.  I left it for 20 min and nothing.

Anyone experience this?

replies.body:
Ah, I've seen this a few times, and it's mentioned in our [Update Client Known Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/231536768) post. You can resolve it with the steps below:

> * Delete your \RADS\solutions\league_client_sln folder if one exists in your League install
* Delete all but your "installer" folder in \RADS\projects\league_client\releases directory
* Run \RADS\projects\league_client\releases\installer\deploy\LeagueClient.exe

Let me know if this worked!

TARGONS BLADE my hero <3
Worked like a charm.
Much love,
PopcornBane
Where to find this "installer" folder  that i do not have to delete?{{item:3455}}

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Tcz5UHo9,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-14T23:50:09.918+0000)
>
> Ah, I've seen this a few times, and it's mentioned in our [Update Client Known Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/231536768) post. You can resolve it with the steps below:
> * Delete all but your "installer" folder in \RADS\projects\league_client\releases directory
> * Run \RADS\projects\league_client\releases\installer\deploy\LeagueClient.exe
> 
> Let me know if this worked!

Is there any fix for Mac?

The fix would work the same on Mac, you'd just have to right click on the League app inside your *Applications* folder and select *Show package contents*, then navigate to the directories the same way.
Sweet jesus. Thanks! I was getting the   updating to previous version and failed to patch restart bs   did exactly this and fired right up. Didn't even have to patch anything.
Great!!! It worked for me :) thanks bud
TYTY It worked 4 me as well!!! <3<3
this really helps! but my "installer" folder was named "0.0.0.57", so thank u! {{summoner:31}}
dude holy jesus thank you so much this was pissing me off so bad. Don't have to use the legacy client anymore!!!
when u say delete all do you mean all the league of legends files?
It worked for me!!!!! <3 thx budy!{{item:1051}}
Omg thx {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
{{item:3672}} fast as fuck
And i again can't click Play button
im with the same problem ...

I can't find the "leauge_client", on mine it says "lol_air_client" or "lol_game_client"...
And i can't find what to delete in either of those folders.. 
FeelsBadMan
Same problem here, 0.0 MB/0.0MB in 15 mins of wait time

none of your fixing sh*t worked , i have limited connection can only play 3 games a day , and then suddenly out of nowhere this "We have restored an older version of LOL" thing , i cant download that 207 update .. i cant afford it , what the hell is this bs , restored to an older version of league ? Why , for what f*cking reason , why do you have to force us to use this garbage buggy client , give us back the old client , and whoever wants to use the new want can u se , and the ones who want the old one can use it toi , but this f*ck tard gaming company must force her sh*t on us
